vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀρχέλαος, -ου, ὁ
Archelaus, son of Herod the Great, King of Judma, Samaria and Idumæa: Mat.2:22.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mat.2.22;
son of: Herod 'the Great' (G2264);
brother of: Herod Antipas I (G2264H), Herod Philip I (G5376H) and Herod Philip II (G5376I)
§ Archelaus, "ruler of people"
Archelaus, (Proper name), Mt. 2:22*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞基老 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "人民的王子"
希律大帝之子,為猶大,撒瑪利亞,以土買的分封王,生性兇殘,
後被奧古思都皇帝所貶謫 (太 2:22)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚基老这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是"人民的王子"
希律大帝之子,为犹大,撒玛利亚,以土买的分封王,生性凶残,
后被奥古思都皇帝所贬谪(太2:22)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-chê-la-u, con của Hê-rốt đại đế. Là lãnh đạo tại xứ Giu-đê
